items: I enjoy taking charge in group situations.
I prefer to make decisions quickly rather than wait for consensus.
I am highly competitive and enjoy challenges.
I feel comfortable giving direct feedback, even if it’s tough to hear.
I get energy from interacting with others and meeting new people.
I prefer working on a team rather than alone.
I enjoy being the center of attention in social or work settings.
I naturally build relationships and connect with people easily.
I prefer having a steady, predictable work environment.
I like to take my time when making decisions.
I am comfortable with repetitive tasks and long-term projects.
I dislike sudden changes in plans or priorities.
I prefer having clear guidelines and processes to follow.
I like to double-check my work to make sure it’s perfect.
I get frustrated when people don’t follow established rules.
